titleStmt.title: SII 14.60: original edition by A. S. Ramanatha Ayyar
No. 60. (A.R. No. 227 of 1932-33.) PERUṄGUḶAM, SRIVAIKUNTAM TALUK, TIRUNELVELI DISTRICT. ON THE NORTH WALL OF THE TIRUVAḺUDĪŚVARA TEMPLE.

summary.p: This Vaṭṭeḻuttu inscription dated in the 2+9th year of Śaḍaiya-Māṟaṉ registers a gift of 13 kāśu by a certain Mūkkaṉ, for burning a lamp in the temple of Tiruvaḻudīśvarattu-Āḻvār at Peruṅguḷam in Tiruvaḻudi-vaḷanāḍu, on behalf of his mother Naraśiṅgam.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svastiśrī . koccaṭaiyamāṟarkku yāṇṭu Iraṇṭu Itaṉetir Oṉpatu Ivvāṇṭu tiruvaḻuti vaḷanāṭṭu peruṅkuḷattu
tiruvaḻutiīśvarattu Āḻvārkku Ittaḷi kuṭi mūkkaṉen ṉenṟāy naraciṅkattaic cātti vaicca tirununtāviḷakku Oṉ
ṟu . Oṉṟiṉukkum vacca kācu patiṉmūṉṟu . Ikkācu patiṉmūṉṟuṅ koṇṭu tevar nārāya Uḻakkināl Uḻakku ney nicata mu
ṭṭāmalaṭṭi Iravum pakalumerippatāyiṉom Ittaḷi Akanāḻikaiyom . Ikkācil Ittaḷi veṭṭikuṭi cāṇi E
ṭṭi vaḻi kuṭutta kācu Āṟu . Āṟukoṇṭu nicatam Āḻākku ney yaṭṭuvatāyiṉeṉ cāṇi Eṭṭi yeṉ . Inney muṭṭil
laṭṭi Erivippataṉukku Iṟaippuṇaip paṭṭom Ittaḷi paṇi ceyyu makanāḻikaiyom .
Digital edition of SII 14.60 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
